3.5 Threads: the Threads structure

sleep

Function

Summary

Puts a thread to sleep.

Signature

MLWORKS.Threads

Structure

MLWorks.Threads

Type

val sleep : 'a thread -> unit

Syntax

sleep t -> ()

Arguments

t
A thread.

Values

()

Description

Puts the thread t to sleep. Raises the exception Threads if t is already asleep.
